version_description:
NEW FIRE FIGHTING FEATURE!

- Get ready to put out fires across the city with the new Fire Emergency mode!
Gather your Team Captains and head out to fight fires and save lives!

- Technical improvements & bug fixes

NEW FIRE FIGHTING FEATURE!

- Get ready to put out fires across the city with the new Fire Emergency mode!
Gather your Team Captains and head out to fight fires and save lives!

- Technical improvements & bug fixes

NEW LANGUAGES AVAILABLE!

You can now also play the game in German, French, Spanish, Korean, Japanese!

More updates coming soon!
Good luck, Firefighters!

The Fire Emergency feature has a brand new look: see your firefighters in action like never before!
Check out it now!

NEW UPDATE

- The environment around the fire station has been updated!
- Check out the new special offers in the Shop for some sweet deals!
- Bug fixes and smaller changes

More updates coming soon!

NEW UPDATE!

- Fixed a bug that caused the list to scroll down after completing a Fire Emergency
- Fixed a bug that caused a Captain to not appear when selected for a Fire Emergency

We are working on something big...stay tuned!
Good luck, Firefighters!

- The city has been expanded! Check out Idle City's brand new look!
- You can now build a 2nd fire station in Idle City!

Good luck, Firefighters!

HUGE UPDATE
- The city has been expanded! Check out Idle City's brand new look!
- You can now build a 2nd & 3rd fire station in Idle City!
- Use the new navigation buttons to quickly switch between your stations

Good luck, Firefighters!

HUGE UPDATE
- The city has been expanded! Check out Idle City's brand new look!
- You can now build a 2nd & 3rd fire station in Idle City!
- Use the new navigation buttons to quickly switch between your stations

Good luck, Firefighters!

- Enjoy Idle City and Capital City's brand new look!
- We fixed some bugs and improved the game's performance!
